content.rendered:
Directed by P.S. Mithran

Written by Geevee. P.S. Mithran. Pon Parthiban. Bipin Ragu. Roju

Cast Karthi (Vijaya Prakash). Raashi Khanna (Shalini). Mohammad Ali Baig (Laughing Buddha). Rithvik Jothi Raj (Timothy akak Timmy (as Rithvik) (as Master Rithvik)). K.S. Krishnan (Dr. Kuppusamy). Shyam Krishnan (Rathore’s Assistant). Laila (Sameera Thomas). Md. Motalib Mondal (Dinesh (credit only)). Chunky Pandey (Maharaj Rathore (as Chunky Panday)). Balaji Sakthivel (Chidambaram).Sahana Vasudevan. Rajisha Vijayan (Indhra Rani). Sal Yusuf (Pakistani General)
Languages Tamil

Producers S. Lakshman Kumar

Production Prince Pictures
